sentences.sContent: Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.sCn: 因为科学家已经发现了一种细菌，可以无需磷生活而以砷代替。

sentences.sContent: When mixed with sulfur, phosphorus, and the kind of heat you get from, say, friction, it's very unstable.
sentences.sContent_eng: When mixed with sulfur, phosphorus, and the kind of heat you get from, say, friction, it's very unstable.
sentences.sCn: 当与硫磺、磷、你从某处获得的某种热量（比如说摩擦力）混合时，它就变得很不稳定。

sentences.sContent: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.sContent_eng: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.sCn: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

trans.tranOther: Phosphorus is a poisonous yellowish-white chemical element. It glows slightly, and burns when air touches it.
